overview_of_class:
The purpose of this class is to introduce students to SolidWorks surface and hybrid modeling techniques. Upon the successful completion of the course, students will have developed and demonstrated a basic understanding of:
The purpose of creating 3D models
Using fundamental SolidWorks features including curves, solid tools, surface tools, rendering, etc.
Creating orthographic views from 3D models
Exporting and importing geometric information for transfer of CAD data from one application to another and understanding different file types
Creating renderings for presentations
name: Rendering: Solidworks
title: MEAS DSGN 325-0-20 Rendering: Solidworks
